title: Nero 2016 Platinum 17.0.045tail With Patch + Content Pack
description:
Nero 2016 Platinum 17.0.04500 Retail + Content Pack

innovative and reliable software Nero 2016 Platinum will provide you with a proven, comprehensive and powerful suite of additional new features for burning, copying, creating, processing, reproduction, transmission, extraction and conversion of multimedia files. With the highest quality results and on virtually any device!	

Applications that are part of Nero in 2016:
â€¢ Nero MediaHome
Â· Search, preview and content management
Â· Playback of photos, videos and music
Â· Playing optical discs
Â· Streaming playback on your TV
â€¢ Nero MediaBrowser
Â· Search, browse and discovery of content
Â· Drag and drop the content to the application
â€¢ Nero Video
Â· Capture and import video from devices
Â· Video Editing (Express mode and Advanced mode)
Â· Reduction and burning DVDs
Â· Export video to file
Â· Export video community
â€¢ Nero Recode
Â· Cutting-Video
Â· Convert video and audio for mobile devices
Â· Convert video and audio for the PC
Â· Convert video to HD and SD formats
â€¢ Nero Burning ROM
Â· Professional burn data and multimedia
Â· Cutting and converting audio
Â· Burn video projects disks
Â· Burn discs with the ability to automatically start and SecurDisc discs
â€¢ Nero Express
Â· Simple burn data and multimedia
Â· Easily copy CDs
Â· Simple cutting Audio-CD
Â· Drive Support CD, DVD, Blu-ray
â€¢ Nero Disc to Device
Â· Copying tracks from an audio CD to a connected device
Â· Copying tracks from an audio CD into iTunes
Â· Copy DVDs to a connected device
Â· Disk Copy the contents on a PC
Â· Disk Copy content from the online store
â€¢ Nero CoverDesigner
Â· Create labels for CDs
Â· Create labels for discs covers
Â· Choice of different design
Â· Create your own templates
Â· Print beautifully decorated materials
â€¢ Nero RescueAgent
Â· Recover files from damaged disks and drives
Â· Recovering partially unreadable or deleted files

The procedure for treatment:
1. Disable Internet.
2. Run the installation program.
3. In the input box to enter a serial number serial number from a text file serial.txt
4. Run the patch administrator.
5. In the "Want to install with serial blacklisted?" click "Yes"
6. Install the program.
7. After the installation uncheck "Enable the notice of the automatic renewal"
8. Re-run the patch as administrator.
9. In the "Want to install with serial blacklisted?" click "No"
10. On the next window "Fix Nero in 2016?" Press "OK"
11. Connect the Internet and use the program.
12. Install ContentPack, if required.

Language: Multilanguage 

What's new in Nero 2016 Platinum 
http://www.nero.com/eng/products/nero-platinum/
